paragraphs: The game assigns certain values dynamically. We have rendered the possibilities in italicized brackets.
<italic>You caused a bit of stir in [location] when you demonstrated the power of your Thu'um. Not everyone is anxious for the return of the Dragonborn.</italic>
I for one desire to see you grow and develop your talents. Skyrim needs a true hero these days.
<italic>You should turn your attention to [dungeon]. I understand it holds a mysterious source of power that can only be unlocked by the Dragonborn.</italic>
